name: JANDAKOT HELI-CO PTY LTD
about: Jandakot Heli-Co is an approved Part 141 Flying School, offering a wide range of courses that comply with the Part 61 Manual Of Standards. With a family tradition in flying and flight training spanning over 30 years, our founding staff are dedicated to providing top-quality, personalized, and professional training. We cater to various pilots, from those seeking a Private Pilot Licence to those advancing their skills with Commercial Pilot Licences, Flight Instructor Ratings, and Low Level Ratings. Our training ensures students have a comprehensive understanding of helicopter operations, enabling them to assess conditions and mitigate risks effectively. We are committed to helping our students achieve their aviation goals and succeed in the industry.
services:
["Trial Introductory Flight
Private and Commercial
Low Level Rating and Endorsements
NVFR(H) Rating"]
